title: Drawing, "Sunset Jamaica", July 1865
medium: Graphite on cream-colored heavy wove paper
markings: Stamped in ink, at lower left: Lugt 457c
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, at bottom left:  Jamaica / July // 65
description: Horizontal distant view over mountain ranges as the sun radiates low in a cloudy sky with a tree at bottom left.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Sunset Jamaica", July 1865.
July 1865. Graphite on cream-colored heavy wove paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-12-b.
